content: this cowl can be quick last minute gift or just another way to utilize less than 100 gr of worsted yarn that left from your another project the gauge is not critical **skill level** advanced beginner **finished measurements ** 24 cm width and 24 cm height after blocking **materials and tools ** * approx 85 gr of worsted yarn preferably at least 50% merino * circular needle 60 cm or 24 long in sizes 4 mm and 5 mm us 6 and us 8 * stitch marker * cable needle
